```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

```{r}
#read in the clim data
clim <- read_csv(here("clim.csv"))

source("almond_model.R")
```


```{r}
temperature <- clim %>% 
  filter(month == "2") %>% 
  group_by(year) %>% 
  summarize(
    avg = mean(tmin_c)
  ) 
```


```{r}
rain <- clim %>% 
  filter(month == "1") %>% 
  group_by(year) %>% 
  summarize(
    sum = sum(precip)
  )

df <- data.frame(temperature, rain) %>% 
  select(-year.1)
```


```{r}
almond_model(clim)

```
